label: Hyper Realism
description: A style of art that emphasizes extreme realism and detail to create images that resemble photographs.

label: Octane Render
description: A high-performance rendering engine that utilizes the power of a graphics card to quickly produce high-quality images.

label: RTX
description: A ray-tracing technology that enhances the realism of lighting, shadows, and reflections in 3D graphics.

label: DLSS
description: A technology that uses deep learning to improve the performance of real-time rendering applications, such as video games, while maintaining high image quality.

label: Ray Tracing
description: A rendering technique that simulates the behavior of light in a virtual environment to create realistic lighting, shadows, and reflections.

label: Volumetric Lighting
description: Lighting effects that create the illusion of depth and volume in a 3D environment.

label: Cinematic Lighting
description: Lighting techniques used in film and video production to create dramatic and visually stunning images

label: 4K
description: A resolution of 3840x2160 pixels, which is four times the resolution of 1080p Full HD.

label: 8K
description: A resolution of 7680x4320 pixels, which is four times the resolution of 4K Ultra HD.

label: HBAO
description: Horizon-Based Ambient Occlusion, a rendering technique used to create more realistic shadows in a 3D environment.

label: HDR
description: High Dynamic Range, a technology used to capture and display a wider range of brightness and color in images and videos.

label: Lumion Render
description: A real-time 3D visualization software used in architecture, engineering, and construction industries to create high-quality renderings and visualizations of designs.

label: High Resolution
description: The output image will have a high pixel count for sharp and clear details.

label: Vibrant Colors
description: The output image will have bright and bold colors for a more eye-catching look.

label: Detailed Texture
description: The output image will have intricate and varied textures for a more tactile appearance.

label: Realistic Lighting
description: The output image will have lighting that accurately simulates real-world lighting conditions.

label: Dynamic Composition
description: The output image will have an engaging and dynamic arrangement of visual elements.

label: Dramatic Contrast
description: The output image will have high contrast between light and dark areas for a bold and dramatic effect.

label: Symmetrical Design
description: The image will have symmetrical balance and a harmonious arrangement of visual elements.

label: Abstract Shapes
description: The output image will feature non-representational shapes for a more experimental and imaginative look.

label: Whimsical Elements
description: The output image will have playful and imaginative elements for a more lighthearted and fun look.

label: Minimalist Aesthetic
description: The output image will have a clean and simple design for a more modern and sophisticated look.

label: Organic Form
description: The image will feature shapes and forms found in nature for an earthy and natural feel.

label: Geometric Patterns
description: The output image will feature geometric shapes and patterns for a more structured and orderly look.

label: Emotional Tone
description: The image will convey a specific emotion or mood through its visual elements and color palette.

label: Nostalgic Vibe
description: The output image will have a vintage or retro feel for a sense of nostalgia and warmth.

label: Futuristic Elements
description: The image will incorporate futuristic elements and technology for a futuristic and forward-thinking look.

label: Bold Lines
description: The image will have strong and bold lines for a more graphic and striking look.

label: Soft Pastel Colors
description: The image will have a soft and muted color palette for a more delicate and subtle look.

label: Harmonious Color Scheme
description: The image will have a color scheme that is pleasing to the eye and creates a sense of harmony.

label: Surrealistic Elements
description: The image will have elements that are dreamlike and strange for a more surreal and imaginative look.

label: Dreamlike Atmosphere
description: The output image will have a soft and ethereal quality for a dreamy and otherworldly feel
